pullRequest.title: Implement new logic for video sizeId in Rubicon bidder
pullRequest.bodyText:
Updated Rubicon bidder's logic:
If imp[].video exists but imp[].ext.rubicon.video.size_id isn't specified
    a. If imp[].video.placement exists and is 1, then set imp[].ext.rubicon.video.size_id=201
    b. else if imp[].video.placement exists and is 3, then set imp[].ext.rubicon.video.size_id=203
    c. else if imp[].instl=1, then set imp[].ext.rubicon.video.size_id=202

commit.message: Implement new logic for video sizeId.

nodes.bodyText:
Please make the variable final.
Move the declaration of the variable near the usage - after skipDelay definition.
Seems we can combine this condition with above.
Let's make it less cryptic and create separate variable for rubiconVideoParams.getSizeId() value.

Usually by the project code style, we name such methods as resolveXXX(..).
In this case we can name it like resolveVideoSizeId(..).
